name: RGB (gajop)
description:
In RGB you are tasked to solve maze puzzles, but with a twist: your vision is split into three screens, in red green and blue channels. You will have to combine the information in these channels in order to find the correct path.

There are a total of 10 levels, and each must completed within 25s. Have fun, and don't break your keyboard :)

Submitted for the https://itch.io/jam/bevy-jam-2 with the theme of "Combine"

You can find the source here https://github.com/gajop/bevy-jam-2
